alert.note: Alert for Walker; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 10:16PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Walker, northwestern Tuscaloosa, northeastern Pickens, southeastern Winston, Fayette and southern Lamar Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1016 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Smith Lake to 6 miles southwest of Jasper to Belk. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Fayette, Sumiton, Cordova, Dora, Carbon Hill, Vernon, Reform, Millport, Arley, Berry, Parrish, Oakman, Kennedy, Sipsey, West Jefferson, Belk, Curry, Gorgas Steam Plant and Boley Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for central, northwestern and west central Alabama.
